card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NYour opponent cannot target a Synchro Monster that used this card as material with monster effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Deep Sea Prima Donna" once per turn.$N●You can target 1 of your opponent's banished cards; add to your hand, or Special Summon, 1 Level 4 or lower WATER monster from your Deck, and if you do, add that target to their hand.$N●If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 banished card; shuffle it into the Deck.
